body:
I like the map Rendovus 2 (pardon my spelling) But it has a problem. The monument rooms. They are extremly OP. Once the enemy gets inside, they can just cover themselves up with wood and mine the monument. I am also concerend about if the exit is blocked for example, the enemy can mine its way in through the wool walls. Im not sure about that but it is a probelm because it is extremly OP against defenders.

So please remove the monument rooms. Thank you- y0urm0m1 Out

title: SUG-Rendovous2

replies.body: Actually, a player cannot even get into their own monument. THAT is op. So, removing the room should be a great idea
